name: Steel Longsword
description: A longsword made from sturdy steel, suitable for skilled swordsmen.
looks: The steel longsword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip. The pommel is adorned with a simple decorative design.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.bleeding: Chance to cause bleeding damage with each successful hit.

name: Fiery Sword
description: A sword imbued with the power of fire, capable of dealing fire damage to enemies.
looks: The Fiery Sword has a long, gleaming blade made of enchanted steel. The hilt is wrapped in leather and has intricate patterns carved into it. The blade emits a faint red glow, and wisps of flames dance along its edges.

special_weapon_skils.Fire Mastery: Increases damage dealt by fire-based attacks.

special_effects.Fiery Strike: Has a chance to set enemies on fire upon successful hit.

name: Iron Axe
description: A sturdy iron axe with a wooden handle. It is ideal for chopping wood or hacking enemies.
looks: The iron axe has a sharp, curved blade made of solid iron. The handle is made of sturdy wood and has a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.axe_mastery: Grants a bonus to Axe Mastery skill when wielded.

name: Elven Bow
description: A beautifully crafted bow made from the wood of the ancient elven trees.
looks: The Elven Bow has a slender and graceful design, with intricate carvings of elven symbols along its length. The wood is smooth and polished to a glossy finish.

special_weapon_skils.archery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

name: Bone Dagger
description: A small dagger carved from a bone
looks: The bone dagger is approximately 6 inches long and has a sharp, pointy blade. The handle is wrapped in leather for a better grip

special_weapon_skills.dagger_proficiency: Grants a bonus to Dagger skill when used

name: Ruby Staff
description: A staff imbued with the power of fire, radiating a warm glow and crackling with flames.
looks: The Ruby Staff is a tall and slender staff made of polished wood, with a large ruby embedded at the top. The ruby glows brightly and emits sparks and flames. The staff is adorned with intricate carvings of fire symbols along its length.

special_effects.fireball: Allows the wielder to cast fireball spells.
special_effects.burning_touch: Adds a chance to apply a burning effect on melee attacks.

special_weapon_skills.staff: Increases damage and accuracy when using a staff.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy and durable armor made of steel plates.
looks: The steel plate armor is made of thick steel plates that cover the entire body. It has a polished silver finish and is adorned with intricate engravings along the edges. The armor includes a helmet, chest plate, gauntlets, and greaves to provide full-body protection.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade, suitable for close combat.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a double-edged edge. The hilt is made of wood and wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy when wielding swords.

name: Steel Axe
description: A heavy steel axe designed for chopping wood or carving through enemies.
looks: The steel axe has a long wooden handle with a steel blade at the top. The blade is sharp and shiny, and the handle is wrapped with leather for a better grip.

special_weapon_skils.axe: Grants a bonus to Axe skill when wielded.

name: Steel Sword
description: A strong and sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The steel sword has a long, straight blade with a double-edged design. The hilt is made of polished wood and has a crossguard for added protection.

special_weapon_skils.swordmanship: Increases damage and accuracy when using swords.

name: Fireball Staff
description: A staff infused with the power of fire, allowing the wielder to cast powerful fireball spells.
looks: The Fireball Staff is crafted from a sturdy oak wood, with intricate carvings of flames along the length of the staff. At the top, there is a glowing fire gem embedded in a metal socket.

special_weapon_skils.fire_magic: Allows the wielder to use advanced fire magic spells.

special_effects.ignite: Chance to set targets on fire with fireball spells.

name: Firebrand Sword
description: A sword imbued with the power of fire, dealing additional fire damage to enemies.
looks: The Firebrand Sword has a curved blade with a fiery pattern etched along the surface. The hilt is wrapped in red leather, and the pommel is adorned with a small flame emblem.

special_weapon_skills.flame_sword: Allows the use of Flame Sword skill, which imbues the blade with fire for a short duration, increasing its damage.

name: Mighty Warhammer
description: A massive warhammer capable of crushing skulls and breaking bones with a single swing.
looks: The Mighty Warhammer is a colossal weapon, with a solid steel head and a sturdy wooden shaft. It has intricate engravings along the head, depicting scenes of battles and conquests. The handle is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skills.Crushing Blow: Chance to stun the target with a powerful blow.

name: Stone Dagger
description: A simple dagger made from stone
looks: The stone dagger has a sharp, pointed blade made from a piece of stone. The handle is wrapped in leather for a better grip.

name: Steel Longsword
description: A well-crafted longsword made from steel
looks: The Steel Longsword has a blade that is approximately 3 feet long, with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in brown leather for a comfortable grip, with a simple crossguard and pommel.

special_weapon_skils.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when wielded.
